additionalfeatures: Audio recording, direct print, USB 2.0 compatibility, auto power save, DPOF support, digital image rotation, PictBridge support, histogram display, in-camera red-eye removal, resizing an image, 720p HD movie recording, face detection, Exif Print support, Auto Scene mode (ASCN), HDR image enhancement technology, Eye-Fi Card Ready, Panorama Capture
whitebalancepresets: Incandescent, fluorescent, cloudy, daylight, fluorescent light (cool white)
facedetection: Blink Detection technology, Face Detection AF/AE, Pet Detection, Smile Shutter
lightsensitivity: ISO 100, ISO 800, ISO 400, ISO 200, ISO 64, ISO 1600, ISO auto
details: 1 x Li-ion rechargeable battery - 1100 mAh ( included )
supportedmemorycards: SD Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card
includedaccessories: Lens cap, shoulder strap, AC power adaptor, USB cable, lens cap strap
flashmodes: Fill-in mode, slow synchro, auto mode, flash OFF mode, red-eye reduction
effectiveflashrange: 0.5 m - 7.5 m : ISO 800 ( wide lens ) 1.2 m - 4.4 m : ISO 800 ( tele lens )
connectortype: 1 x USB 2.0 1 x composite video/audio output 1 x HDMI output
